title: Forsaken Fate
description: The epic conclusion to Samantha and Cadeanâ€™s story.Expect vengeance, romance, and a dark destiny finally fulfilled.Forsaken fate is the final book in of a dual-POV, enemies-to-lovers romance culminating with a HEA.
